headline: Cummins (NYSE:CMI) Sees Earnings and Revenue Decline in Q1 2025
summary: Cummins (NYSE:CMI) reported a significant decline in financial performance for Q1 2025, with sales and net income falling compared to the previous year. Despite this downturn, the company's share price increased by 8.89% over the past month. During this period, Cummins launched new Battery Energy Storage Systems in the Middle East, highlighting its commitment to innovation and energy transition. The appointment of a new Chief Legal Officer also marked an important reshuffling within the...

headline: Avaio Digital and Cummins Partner to Accelerate AI-Ready Data Center Development
summary: AVAIO Digital has signed an agreement with Cummins Inc. to purchase generators to deliver critical backup power for AVAIO's data centers. ensuring seamless and reliable power for critical operations...
